landing-hero-description: With **AmazoniaForever360+**, unlock powerful insights about one of the planet's most vital ecosystem mosaics. Our intuitive platform transforms complex territorial data into actionable knowledge—no technical expertise needed. From biodiversity to infrastructure, explore and analyze to drive sustainable impact across Amazonia.
landing-about-description: AmazoniaForever360+ is a free tool initiated by the IDB as part of its Amazonia Forever program to help all those involved in the development and conservation of the Amazon better understand this immense and complex territory. The platform is designed to evolve alongside the needs of its users and partners across the region and beyond.
landing-key-features-report-description: Create customized reports focused on your areas of interest, with actionable insights and data visualizations generated instantly from our comprehensive territorial knowledge base.
landing-key-features-grid-description: **Grid-Powered Analytics** Beyond the report, dive deeper into your selected area using our standardized hexagonal grid system to play with indicators and identify locations that match your specific criteria, from biodiversity hotspots to demographic patterns.
landing-information-on-title: A wide range of indicators from different topics
landing-information-on-description: Navigate through a curated selection of topics to uncover the Amazonia's multifaceted story. From environmental to socioeconomic dynamics, our platform brings you a comprehensive perspective.
landing-glance-title: A mosaic of ecosystems and habitats
landing-glance-description: **A Continent-sized Mosaic of Cultures and Nature Across Eight Countries** Spanning 8.4 million square kilometers across eight South American countries, Amazonia represents one of the planet's most diverse confluences of cultures and ecosystems.
landing-glance-chart-source-title: Global Human Settlement Layer (GHSL) - Population projection for 2025;
landing-partners-title: We will not do this alone.
landing-partners-description: As a regional public good initiated by the IDB Group, AmazoniaForever360+ will seek to build on strong alliances with strategic, data and technology partners.
landing-cta-title: Select your area of interest, choose the indicators that matter to you, and generate a personalized report about Amazonia. Explore the data, discover insights, and share your findings.
landing-help-description: AmazoniaForever360+ is in active development, and your feedback is vital to helping us improve. We invite you to share your thoughts and help shape the next phase of AmazoniaForever360+!
landing-help-description-2: Our platform is mobile-friendly with a streamlined version for quick access, though some features are limited.
auth-agreement-text: By continuing you agree with our
auth-validation-terms-required: You must agree to the terms and privacy policy
hub-intro-1: Welcome to the Hub - your future one-stop destination for essential information to guide decision-making in the Amazonia region. Once complete, it will facilitate **collaboration, coordination, and knowledge sharing**, empowering you to make informed choices that drive positive impact.
hub-intro-2: While the Hub is under development, we encourage you to explore our Report Tool, which currently offers valuable insights into the dynamics of Amazonia.
grid-sidebar-report-title: Get insights on your area of interest
grid-sidebar-report-description: Use the search bar or draw on the map to select a region. You’ll need an area to generate a report, but you can still browse the DataHub or run grid analyses without one.
grid-sidebar-report-location-filters-ale: You can only select up to 4 layers
By proceeding, the map will center around your selected cell, and the current area selection will be redefined. This action will remove your existing selection.
grid-sidebar-report-sketch-point-descrip: Click on the map to select a single point and get a buffer radius of 30km²
grid-sidebar-report-sketch-area-descript: Draw your custom area of interest
grid-sidebar-report-sketch-line-descript: Draw a line a get a buffer around it of 10km²
grid-sidebar-report-location-note: **Click** on the shape to enable edit mode.
grid-sidebar-report-location-ai-title:
Detect patterns within Amazonia  
  using the Grid
grid-sidebar-report-location-ai-descript: Redefine your area selection by using the grid. Add indicators to highlight areas that meet specific criteria.
grid-sidebar-report-location-topics-desc: Select **one or more topics** on which you want to get information for this area.
grid-sidebar-grid-filters-description: Add indicators to filter the grid cells and highlight areas that meet specific criteria. You can select a maximum 4 indicators.
grid-sidebar-grid-filters-ranking-title-: Please select filters to view top cells
grid-sidebar-grid-filters-ranking-descri: Click on a row in the table to redefine your area and center the map on the corresponding cell.
grid-sidebar-grid-filters-ranking-set-up: Define the order of the cells
Higher numbers will take more time
grid-sidebar-indicators-description: Pick the indicators you want to show on the map for a deeper understanding of the area. You can create a report with these selected indicators.
grid-sketch-tooltip-create-start-polygon: To get started, **click** on the map to add point. Press **ESC** to cancel.
grid-sketch-tooltip-create-active-polygo: Click to add points, then **double-click** or press **Enter** to finish drawing.
grid-sketch-tooltip-create-complete-poly: Great! To **edit the shape**, **click** on the edit icon to enable edit mode.
grid-sketch-tooltip-create-start-polylin: To get started, **click** on the map to add point. Press **ESC** to cancel.
grid-sketch-tooltip-create-active-polyli: Click to add points, then **double-click** or press **Enter** to finish drawing.
grid-sketch-tooltip-create-complete-poly: Great! To **edit the shape**, **click** on the edit icon to enable edit mode.
grid-sketch-tooltip-create-start-point: To get started, **click** on the map to add point. Press **ESC** to cancel.
grid-sketch-tooltip-create-active-point: To get started, **click** on the map to add point. Press **ESC** to cancel.
grid-sketch-tooltip-create-complete-poin: Great! To **move the point**, just **click** on the edit icon and drag it to a new location.
grid-sketch-tooltip-update-start-polygon: Use the **handles** to edit the polygon - move (drag a handle), add (left-click on a white handle), or remove (right-click on a handle) points as needed. You can press **ESC** to confirm.
grid-sketch-tooltip-update-active-polygo: To confirm the new shape, please **click out** of the shape or press **ESC**.
grid-sketch-tooltip-update-start-polylin: Move the **handles** to edit the polygon - move (drag a handle), add (left-click on a white handle), or remove (right-click on a handle) points as needed. You can press **ESC** to confirm.
grid-sketch-tooltip-update-active-polyli: To confirm the new shape, please **click out** of the shape or press **ESC**.
grid-sketch-tooltip-update-start-point: Move the point. You can press **ESC** to confirm.
grid-sketch-tooltip-update-active-point: **Click** outside the point or press **ESC** to confirm the new position.
grid-map-tooltip: Click on the cell to redefine the area of interest
mobile-alert-description: Some features may be restricted on mobile for better usability. For full functionality, please consider using a larger screen
card-no-results:
No results for this location at the moment.  
  Feel free to adjust your search criteria or check back later!
report-results-buttons-new-report-descri:
Selecting a new area will start a fresh report and reset your current session. 

 Any progress in your existing report will be lost.
new-report-modal-warning: To save your current report, you can copy the shareable link before continuing.
report-results-unsaved-changes-descripti: You have unsaved changes in your current report. If you continue, your progress will be lost.
report-results-unsaved-changes-download-: You have made changes to your report, please save before downloading to see the latest version
You have made changes to this report, please duplicate before downloading to see the latest version
report-results-disclaimer-part-1: The maps, data, and geographic information presented on AmazoniaForever360+ are provided for reference purposes only and are intended solely to enhance territorial knowledge of the Amazonia Forever program's work area.
report-results-disclaimer-part-2: International boundary lines and other administrative delimitations used by AmazoniaForever360+ are sourced from carefully selected and well-referenced external sources. However, the original data may have been modified to meet cartographic visualization requirements. The cartographic material presented does not reflect any position held by the Inter-American Development Bank (IDB) regarding international borders, disputes, or claims between countries.
report-results-disclaimer-part-3: This material is not suitable for precision applications, navigation, or emergency situations. The material may also contain text summaries generated using AI, which may contain errors or omissions. You are solely responsible for reviewing, editing, and validating the accuracy and suitability of final content. AmazoniaForever360+ and its affiliates, including the Inter-American Development Bank (IDB), shall not be held liable for any damages, losses, or claims arising from the use of or reliance on the information provided.
report-results-sidebar-indicators-descri: Add indicators to your report and view them in various formats— **map, table, chart, etc.**
report-results-sidebar-ai-summaries-desc: Choose a text style to create summaries for the active indicators in your topic.
auth-validation-email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address
auth-validation-name-min-length: Name must be at least 2 characters long
auth-validation-password-min-length: Password must be at least 6 characters long
auth-toast-login-failed: Failed to log in. Please check your credentials and try again.
auth-toast-account-creation-failed: Failed to create account. Please try again.
auth-toast-reset-email-failed: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
auth-toast-password-reset-failed: Failed to reset password. Please try again. Token is either invalid or has expired.
auth-signin-description: Sign in to save and manage your reports, and gain access to the AI Assistant for generating and refining summaries.
auth-signup-description: Enter your information below to create your account
auth-forgot-password-description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth-verify-email-description: You can now sign in to your account using your credentials.
auth-check-email-description: An email with instruction has been sent to your inbox. Please check your email. If you haven't received it, feel free to request another one.
auth-field-password-description: Must be at least 6 characters long.
report-results-sidebar-ai-summaries-audi: For clear and balanced information to suit any audience.
Quick, focused insights to convey key data effectively.
Detailed and thorough for deep understanding and context.
report-results-sidebar-ai-summaries-chec: Include only active indicators in the generated summaries. Changes to the indicators will require generating new summaries.
report-results-sidebar-ai-summaries-gene: AI generated summaries can be inaccurate. We encourage you to verify the content carefully
report-results-sidebar-ai-summaries-disc: The summary is generated using AI and may contain errors or omissions. You are solely responsible for reviewing, editing, and validating the accuracy and suitability of the final content.
report-results-copy-description: This link lets you share the report and saves its current status. Copy it to revisit or share with others.
author: Author
reset-topics-info-tooltip: Clear all widgets and set the topic to its default view
not-found-page-message: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed or is temporarily unavailable.
not-found-report-message: The report you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed or is temporarily unavailable.
error-page-message: The server encountered an internal error or misconfiguration and was unable to complete your request.
metadata-check-your-email-page-descripti: We've sent you a verification email
drawing-tools-draw-point: Click on the map to select a single point and get a buffer radius around it.
drawing-tools-draw-area: Draw your custom area of interest.
drawing-tools-draw-line: Draw a line and get a buffer around it.
sidebar-report-grid-title: Refine your area of interest with the Grid
sidebar-report-grid-description: Highlight grid cells that match your criteria to spot key trends and patterns across an area.
sidebar-report-location-indicators-descr: Select the topics you want to include in your report. You can also proceed and add indicators later.
sidebar-report-indicators-description: Explore available datasets, overlay multiple layers, and gain insights from an area.
consent-message:
AmazoniaForever360+ uses cookies that collect personal data in order to measure the audience and analyze the needs of our users, with the goal of improving the platform. 

 If you accept the use of cookies, data will be shared with [Fullstory](https://www.fullstory.com/). If you refuse, no cookies will be set and no data collection will occur. 

 Find out more from our [Privacy Policy](https://www.iadb.org/en/home/terms-conditions-and-notices/privacy-notice).
pdf-report-cover-subtitle: This report includes a geographic context{topics}
pdf-report-generating-subtitle: Your report is being generated. This may take some time depending on the size of your selected area and the number of indicators included.
indicator-webshot-error: There was an error exporting the PNG for {name}. Please try again.
my-reports-description: View and manage your published reports
my-reports-no-reports-description: Try adjusting your search or create a new report
my-reports-rename-dialog-description: Update the title and description of your report.
my-reports-delete-dialog-description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your report.
profile-description: Manage your account settings and preferences
profile-delete-account-description: Deleting your account is permanent, so please make sure you're certain before proceeding.
profile-delete-account-dialog-descriptio: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers, including all your reports.
pdf-outro-description-1: Click the link bellow or scan the QR code to access the online version of this report.
pdf-outro-description-2: There, you can review updated information, interact with the data, and access the content in additional languages.
pdf-outro-tagline: Keep understanding Amazonia like never before.
pdf-report-button-description: In the dialog window, select **Save as PDF, Save to PDF, Print to File**, or a printer to print the report. For best results, set the layout to Landscape and disable page margins.
edit-location-confirm-dialog-description:
You've changed your area of interest. Please note:

- Any AI-generated texts you've already created may not fully reflect this new area. You can still edit them if needed.
- Some indicators might not have data for this selection.
upload-geometry-dialog-description:
Upload one or multiple geometry files in one of the following formats:

- **Shapefile**: 3 mandatory files (.shp, .shx, .dbf) and 2 optional files (.prj, .cpg)
- **KML**: 1 .kml file
- **KMZ**: 1 .kmz file
- **GeoJSON**: 1 .geojson or .json file
generic-error: Something went wrong while uploading your geometry file. Please try again or upload a different file.
invalid-xml-syntax: The file contains invalid XML syntax and can’t be read. Please check the file format and try again.
shp-missing-file: This Shapefile is incomplete. Make sure all required files (.shp, .shx, .dbf) are included.
unsupported-file: This file type is not supported. Please upload a valid geometry file.
area-too-big: The uploaded geometry is too large. Please upload a smaller or more simplified geometry.
outside-of-bounds: The geometry is outside the supported geographic bounds. Please upload a file within the allowed area.
dropzone-drag-drop-upload: Drag and drop or click to upload
dropzone-drag-drop-replace: Drag and drop or click to replace
